keyRequirements: Leadership development program for 25 mid-level managers
Individual coaching sessions (at least 2 per participant)
Training must be completed within 4 months (September-December 2023)
Budget allocation: $75,000 maximum for entire program
potentialChallenges: Accommodating participants across multiple time zones for virtual sessions
Completing comprehensive leadership training within the 4-month timeframe
Balancing quality training delivery with the strict budget constraints
Finding trainers with specific technology industry experience
nonNegotiablePoints: Training completion by December 2023 (fiscal year end)
Minimum of 2 coaching sessions per participant
In-person sessions must be at San Francisco headquarters
Trainers must have technology industry experience
flexiblePoints: Distribution between in-person and virtual sessions
Specific content delivery methods within the blended approach
Scheduling of sessions (as long as completed by December)

valueJustification: Customized program addressing specific leadership gaps in technical managers
Experienced trainers with technology industry background ensuring relevant content
Blended learning approach maximizing engagement while minimizing disruption
Comprehensive measurement system to demonstrate clear ROI on training investment

deliverables: Customized leadership curriculum for 25 mid-level technology managers
8 interactive workshops (4 in-person, 4 virtual) covering strategic thinking, team management, communication, conflict resolution, and change management
50 individual coaching sessions (2 per participant) with technology-experienced executive coaches
Comprehensive participant workbooks and digital resources with Global Innovations branding
Pre/post assessments and final ROI analysis report
